H0.text: Who won the Oscar for Best Film Director for the film Silence of the Lambs. Martin Scorsese

H1.text: Who won the Oscar for Best Film Director for the film Silence of the Lambs. Steven Spielberg

H2.text: Who won the Oscar for Best Film Director for the film Silence of the Lambs. Quentin Tarantino

H3.text: Who won the Oscar for Best Film Director for the film Silence of the Lambs. Jonathon Demme

A4.text: Demme won the Academy Award for The Silence of the Lambs (1991)
